Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
CurrentFuel = Tool:WaitForChild("CurrentFuel") StandStill = Tool:WaitForChild("StandStill") FuelGui = Tool:WaitForChild("FuelGui")
EngineFail = Handle:WaitForChild("EngineFail") InitialThrust = Handle:WaitForChild("InitialThrust") LowFuelWarning = Handle:WaitForChild("LowFuelWarning") ThrustingAnim = Handle:WaitForChild("Thrusting")
CurrentCamera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Mass = 0 EqualizingForce = 236 / 1.2 -- amount of force required to levitate a mass Gravity = 0.80 -- things float at > 1
MaxFuel = 1300
Fuel = CurrentFuel.Value Gui = nil Anim = nil JetPack = nil Regen = false
Force = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") Force.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.P = 20000 BodyGyro.D = 8000 BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(BodyGyro.P, BodyGyro.P, BodyGyro.P)
function UpdateGui() if Gui then local Frame = Gui:FindFirstChild("Frame") if Frame then Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 32, 0.45 * (CurrentFuel.Value / MaxFuel), 0) Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.903, 0, 0.2 + (0.45 * (1 - CurrentFuel.Value / MaxFuel)), 0) end end end
function Thrust() if Fuel > 0 then Thrusting = true Force.Parent = Torso Fire.Enabled = true LeftSmoke.Enabled = true RightSmoke.Enabled = true InitialThrust:Play() BodyGyro.Parent = Torso while Thrusting do BodyGyro.cframe = CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame Force.velocity = Vector3.new(0, CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame.lookVector.unit.y, 0) * 50 Fuel = Fuel - 1 CurrentFuel.Value = Fuel if Fuel <= 0 then EngineFail:Play() CutEngine() end UpdateGui() wait() ThrustingAnim:Play() if Fuel <= 200 then LowFuelWarning:Play() end end ThrustingAnim:Stop() LowFuelWarning:Stop() end end
function CutEngine() Thrusting = false Fire.Enabled = false LeftSmoke.Enabled = false RightSmoke.Enabled = false Force.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) Force.Parent = nil Anim:Stop() BodyGyro.Parent = nil end
function RecursiveGetLift(Parent) local TotalMass = 0 for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then if Head and Head.Parent and (v.Position - Head.Position).magnitude < 10 then TotalMass = TotalMass + (v:GetMass() * EqualizingForce * 1) else TotalMas = TotalMass + (v:GetMass() * EqualizingForce * Gravity) end end TotalMass = TotalMass + RecursiveGetLift(v) end return TotalMass end
function RegenFuel() while Regen do if Fuel < MaxFuel then Fuel = Fuel + 1 CurrentFuel.Value = Fuel UpdateGui() end wait(0.2) end end
function EquipJetPack()
JetPack = Handle:clone() JetPack.CanCollide = false JetPack.Name = "JetPack"
Handle.Transparency = 1
local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = JetPack Weld.Part1 = Torso Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.25, -1.25)) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) Weld.Parent = JetPack
FirePart = Instance.new("Part") FirePart.Name = "FirePart" FirePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block FirePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic FirePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom FirePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth FirePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth FirePart.Transparency = 1 FirePart.Anchored = false FirePart.CanCollide = false FirePart.Locked = true FirePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 1) FirePart.Parent = JetPack
Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Heat = -12 Fire.Size = 4 Fire.Enabled = false Fire.Parent = FirePart
local FireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") FireWeld.Part0 = FirePart FireWeld.Part1 = JetPack FireWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)) FireWeld.Parent = FirePart
LeftSmokePart = Instance.new("Part") LeftSmokePart.Name = "LeftSmokePart" LeftSmokePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block LeftSmokePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic LeftSmokePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom LeftSmokePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LeftSmokePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LeftSmokePart.Transparency = 1 LeftSmokePart.Anchored = false LeftSmokePart.CanCollide = false LeftSmokePart.Locked = true LeftSmokePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 1) LeftSmokePart.Parent = JetPack
LeftSmoke = Instance.new("Smoke") LeftSmoke.Color = BrickColor.new("Institutional white").Color LeftSmoke.Opacity = 0.25 LeftSmoke.RiseVelocity = 0 LeftSmoke.Size = 0.1 LeftSmoke.Enabled = false LeftSmoke.Parent = LeftSmokePart
local LeftSmokeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") LeftSmokeWeld.Part0 = LeftSmokePart LeftSmokeWeld.Part1 = JetPack LeftSmokeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1.25, 1.5, 0)) LeftSmokeWeld.Parent = LeftSmokePart
RightSmokePart = Instance.new("Part") RightSmokePart.Name = "RightSmokePart" RightSmokePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block RightSmokePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic RightSmokePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom RightSmokePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth RightSmokePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth RightSmokePart.Transparency = 1 RightSmokePart.Anchored = false RightSmokePart.CanCollide = false RightSmokePart.Locked = true RightSmokePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 1) RightSmokePart.Parent = JetPack
RightSmoke = Instance.new("Smoke") RightSmoke.Color = BrickColor.new("Institutional white").Color RightSmoke.Opacity = 0.25 RightSmoke.RiseVelocity = 0 RightSmoke.Size = 0.1 RightSmoke.Enabled = false RightSmoke.Parent = RightSmokePart
local RightSmokeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") RightSmokeWeld.Part0 = RightSmokePart RightSmokeWeld.Part1 = JetPack RightSmokeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1.25, 1.5, 0)) RightSmokeWeld.Parent = RightSmokePart
JetPack.Parent = Character
end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Head or not Torso then return end wait() EquipJetPack()
Mass = RecursiveGetLift(Character) Force.P = Mass * 10 Force.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, Force.P, 0) Mouse.Button1Down:connect(Thrust) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(CutEngine) Anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(StandStill) if Anim then Anim:Play() end Gui = FuelGui:Clone() UpdateGui() Gui.Parent = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") Regen = true RegenFuel() end
function Unequipped() Regen = false if Force and Force.Parent then Force.Parent = nil end if BodyGyro and BodyGyro.Parent then BodyGyro.Parent = nil end if Anim then Anim:Stop() end if Gui and Gui.Parent then Gui:Destroy() end if JetPack and JetPack.Parent then JetPack:Destroy() end Handle.Transparency = 0 Thrusting = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
